abort.already_configured: This market area is already configured.

options.title: Net Price Options
options.description: Configure surcharges and tax to calculate net price per kWh.

init.title: Net Price Options
init.description: Configure surcharges and tax to calculate net price per kWh.

get_lowest_price_interval.description: Get the time interval during which the price is at its lowest point.

device_id.description: An EPEX Spot service instance ID. In case you have multiple EPEX Spot instances.
device_id.name: EPEX Spot Service

earliest_start.description: Earliest time to start the appliance. If omitted, the current time is used. Refers to today if `Earliest Start Offset` is not set or 0, or tomorrow if offset is 1.
earliest_start.name: Earliest Start Time

earliest_start_post.description: Postponement of `Earliest Start Time` in days: 0 = today (default), 1 = tomorrow
earliest_start_post.name: Postponement of Earliest Start

latest_end.description: Latest time to end the appliance. If omitted, the end of the available market data is used. Refers to today if `Latest End Offset` is not set or 0, or tomorrow if offset is 1.
latest_end.name: Latest End Time

latest_end_post.description: Postponement of `Latest End Time` in days: 0 = today (default), 1 = tomorrow.
latest_end_post.name: Postponement of Latest End

get_lowest_price_interval.name: Get lowest price interval

get_highest_price_interval.description: Get the time interval during which the price is at its highest point.
